name: Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii: Holiday Special (ROM Hack)
name_original: Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii: Holiday Special (ROM Hack)
description: Newer: Holiday Special (also known as Newer Super Mario Bros.: Holiday Special) is a short seasonal hack of New Super Mario Bros. Wii by the Newer Team which was released in Christmas 2011. It is the first game of the Newer series in release order.
